item.description:
Well...you asked for it...so here it is...GAME NIGHT!!!

We're playing cards (you name the game), Cannasta, Board Games...whatever you choose. I can set up at least 5 different tables with various games going on. If you don't play games or cards...come anyway...for the fun of it!

We can try this out and make it a monthly thing if it goes well. So come out, see what it is all about and lets have a blast!

Here is what we'll do...bring your game, a deck of cards, or whatever. Bring your beverage (ahem...lol), perhaps a snack...nothing big, maybe some chips, nuts, a dessert or whatever you like to pick on. I'll supply the house, ice, paper goods...well you all know the drill.

Join us for FUN & GAMES NIGHT!

group.name: The West Hartford Over 40 Fun Bunch!

item.name: Deal Me In...Cards, Games, Etc.
